Reviews.Title: Totalmente satisfecho con la compra!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Pineda "Carlitos"
Reviews.Content: Excelente telefono, muy funcional, llegò a Venezuela en buenas condiciones y con todos sus accesorios, totalmente nuevo, con Digitel solo trabaja en EDGE, levanta 3G con Movistar, lo recomiendo ampliamente, satisfecho!

Reviews.Title: on time!!!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: The phone is exacly as is shown. I have no regreats. So far so good. Great relation cost-quality. I only wonder, why no warranty?

Reviews.Title: Telefono ligero y super funcional
Reviews.Author: MODESTO ALFONSO
Reviews.Content: El tlf. viene tal cual como se aprecia en la imagen; viene con cargadores (tanto europeo como anglosajon), audifonos y cable usb para pc. El telefono viene liberado y es nuevo de fabrica (nada que ver con telefonos reconstruidos o de segunda mano). En fin, 100% recomendado!!.

Reviews.Title: buy on surgetelecom
Reviews.Author: MANUEL CHIRINOS
Reviews.Content: ship very fast, work with 3G bands 1,2,5,6 new in box with all accesories (perfecto para movilnet y movistar venezuela)

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Jesler G. Garcia Rojas "jesler"
Reviews.Content: Great phone, slim, lightweight and very fast compared to 8520, new OS is big improvement!! great ease of use, email and text facilities are brilliant! I really like the idea of a physical keyboard and the operating system is easy to navigate. The phone is still very new so the programs and actions are still lightning quick. Videos look very good on the small screen. Text/email is a snap. The display is awesome. The BB App World isn't great, I am very happy with this investment so far.Pros: Very easy to use, Great keyboard, Good build quality

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: luis Astros
Reviews.Content: Very good product I bought it to send it over seas to Venezuela and so far it works great down there.

Reviews.Title: MY OPINION ON BLACBERRY CURVE 9320 BLANCO WIFI
Reviews.Author: YAMILIS BATISTA
Reviews.Content: I AM IN VENEZUELA AND HAS WORKED WELL WITH GSM. RECOMMEND IT, THE SAME DAY AS I started USE AS REVIEW BEFORE BUYING OTHERS OPINIONS.

Reviews.Title: No good for movistar and movilnet venezuela
Reviews.Author: Nina B.
Reviews.Content: The descripcion said el had 3G bands UMTS 800/850/1900/2100, it is not true. I cant get 3G on my movistar in venezuela it just works for digitel. So if your from venezuela and have digitel, go ahead it will work for you but not for movistar or movilnet

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 9320
Reviews.Author: Chyis
Reviews.Content: I choose this Blackberry Curve 9320 White because of my gorlfriend wish same capability mobile for use. We are an international couple, so we need unlocked and quad band phone wich can used with all Service provider SIM. It has WiFi, Keyboard and not to mention it is unlocked and QuadBand Cell Phone. This phone arrived in time, tracking was very helpful. She like it very much and of course if my girlfriend like, it is good for me too. Easy to use and keyboard better as I thought first. So we got what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: Completely New product!!!!
Reviews.Author: Orlando Eusebio Ozoria "Orlando Eusebio Ozoria"
Reviews.Content: This team is OEM that doesn't bring logo of any operator it is completely new and in Venezuela he/she lifts 3g alone for the operator Digitel and Edge for Movistar and Movilnet.

Reviews.Title: good cellphone
Reviews.Author: Jesus Medrano
Reviews.Content: i love the weight because is too light and also i like the bbm function because give a connection with my contacts but i don't like the camera i guess they might improve because  it's a 200 dollars phone but anyway i think it's a good phone

Reviews.Title: Bien - Fine
Reviews.Author: Yohandy Iglesias "Yohandy Iglesias"
Reviews.Content: El teléfono llego en buen estado y con todos sus accesorios, lo único es que no funciona el 3g con Movistar Venezuela, deberían colocar mas información en cuanto a las bandas con las que operan.The phone arrived in good condition and with all accessories, only thing is it does not work on 3g with Movistar Venezuela, should put more information about the bands that operate

Reviews.Title: Nice phone.
Reviews.Author: Jaime Camacho
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my sister. She likes a lot. Sometimes, it is very slow and the screen resolution is not good.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: shamsheer shah
Reviews.Content: VERY NICE DEVICE AND I LOVED IT, GOING TO TELL MY FRIENDS TOO TO BUY THIS,CAN GIVE  100 MARKS TO THIS PRODUCT

Reviews.Title: THANK YOU
Reviews.Author: MILEXY
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE IS BEAUTIFUL, IT WORKS PERFECTLY. I LOVE IT!It's SPECIAL FOR A LADY. LIGHT BUT VERY TOUGH. THANKS

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Pilar Monsalve
Reviews.Content: The delivery of the phone was on time, in perfect conditionI loved this phone, the color, the weight, the camera is good, heats up a bit when the battery is widely used. I recommend NEVER allow the battery to downloadGood price, works with 3G and 4G for Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Battery in disrepair
Reviews.Author: ERIKA MARCHAN
Reviews.Content: The order came to my hands the day 11.11.2013, the team arrived with the battery in poor condition, therefore not tested the same

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Yopi
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife and she loves it. Its been performing very well so far and we hope it continues to do that. However the battery life is not that very good. One has to charge it everyday even with moderate use.

Reviews.Title: it is a nice instrument; very light, thin and not heavy. Easy to carry in your shirt's pocket,
Reviews.Author: Oscar Del Barco E "OBE"
Reviews.Content: it is a nice instrument; very light, thin and is not heavy. Friendly menus considering it has various screens tan can be configure to your requirements.Initially I had a few problemns when trying to upgrade the OS.it came with v7.1.0.398 Platform 9.49.0.31. The newest is v7.1.0.1033 Platform 9.49.0.123. I ended up in a versión some where in between those two. Besides this, I am pleased with my pone.

Reviews.Title: I don't agree
Reviews.Author: Yulimar
Reviews.Content: the cellphone works well but the box was horrible, it looks all, the accesories came incomplete, it didn't brought the headphones.

Reviews.Title: all right
Reviews.Author: by Jose Santana
Reviews.Content: is just another BlackBerry handheld, it makes all it functions, no much to say. no scratches, no damages, both are perfectly new, never open and ready to use

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Eduardo M. "Eduardo Mesa"
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, meets all the requirements and you need to have a good smart phone, fast, good processability, very good

Reviews.Title: Great battery and actualized os
Reviews.Author: Joe Gil "Joe"
Reviews.Content: This cellphone is one of the best bb i have ever tried. The battery life its far good as the other curve. It's very fast (obviously compared with other bb not other device). It came truly OEM as spected, buyed form surgetelecom. Arrived fast!

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: nice phone, it work in all gms operator in venezuela. I give it to my daugther and she love it

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Jesús salvador pino ferrer
Reviews.Content: thank you very much the product is brand new, very good very careful attention is everything I wanted the product. I am satisfied with the service of wrapping and sending thank you, I look forward to shopping with you in the future thanks

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CELL
Reviews.Author: Jeinmys Guillen
Reviews.Content: ARRIVED IN GOOD CONDITION, COLOR, DISPLAY, ALL ACCESSORIES (HANDS FREE, CHARGER, BATTERY, MANUAL), WORKS PROPERLY FAST DOWNLOAD APPLICATIONS, BLACKBERRY DEFINITELY AN EXCELLENT.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Merby L. Aponte D
Reviews.Content: Totalmente satisfecha con el producto, recibido en perfectas condiciones de apariencia y operatividad en el tiempo estipulado, los recomiendo totalmente

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: samuel
Reviews.Content: Exelente producto (caracas - venezuela) llego a tiempo y en buenas condiciones  liberado todos los accesorios  buena tienda y buen servicio de envio  gracias

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: ELIZABETH
Reviews.Content: Excelente calidad de producto lo recomiendo 100% llego en perfecto tardo un poco en llegar a  a venezuela muchas gracias a venezuela muchas gracias

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: leonard
Reviews.Content: panasonic lumix very good telefono was a gift for my wife to it him encanto el telefono the color also liked what found very handy

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9320 Blanco
Reviews.Author: Ysabel Olazo
Reviews.Content: El producto fue enviado con gran rapidez, fueron responsables y enviaron el producto como lo describieron en la publicacion, recomendados

Reviews.Title: argeni sanchez
Reviews.Author: argeni luis sanchez
Reviews.Content: es un telf muy completo, mi hija quedo encantada, le puse la linea movistar aqui en venezuela y trabaja super bien,

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: francisco sifontes
Reviews.Content: the transsaccion was performed in the shortest possible time and without mishap, not that great, as there were no problems of any kind, congratulations

Reviews.Title: Gracias a tiendas 24hrs
Reviews.Author: Daniel "Daniel Duque"
Reviews.Content: El celular es como lo ven nuevo de paquete gracias a dios, la tienda es muy seria se los recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Excellent, great
Reviews.Author: Evencio
Reviews.Content: I recived it Vodafone. I am satisfied with this. excellent condition, applications, all in perfect working order, I highly recommend it. 1900Mhz band unlocked Movistar Venezuela

Reviews.Title: very cool
Reviews.Author: jean
Reviews.Content: excelente compra!! me gustro el equipo y funciona perfectamente con las operadoras movilnet y movistar!!recomiendo 100% al vendedor!! saludos.

Reviews.Title: Please reply
Reviews.Author: Stephbella
Reviews.Content: Does anyone know if this phone works well with tmobile? Its strange that everyone who commenting on this product is from Venezuela or knows someone out there. I just want to know if it will work well with tmobile usa

Reviews.Title: Punto de Vista
Reviews.Author: Richard Barboza
Reviews.Content: Un excelente equipo fue un regalo para mi hijo en navidad le ha dado tremendo uso a este equipo, los recomiendo ampliamente

Reviews.Title: Hello Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Jose Ferrer
Reviews.Content: I like the cell phone because it covered my expectations.Excellent product.Very good acquisition.I think I'll buy another but Blackberry Bold 9780 White.Goodbye.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good seller, my order arrived within the stipulated time, recommend to all, five stars seller, I am satisfied with my purchase since buying amazon has always been a pleasant experience. Once you have the product in your hands you can not think of anything else other than you made an excellent choice to disburse money to acquire it. The seller will behave responsibly and comply with the details and shipping details. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.Excelente producto, muy buen vendedor, mi pedido llegó en el tiempo estipulado, lo recomiendo a todos, cinco estrellas al vendedor, estoy satisfecho con mi compra ya que comprar en amazon siempre ha sido una experiencia agradable. Una vez tienes el producto en tus manos no puedes pensar en otra cosa que no sea que hiciste una excelente elección al desembolsar dinero por adquirirlo. El vendedor se comporto responsable y cumplió con los detalles del producto y los detalles del envío. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.

Reviews.Title: kendell
Reviews.Author: kendell
Reviews.Content: excelente!!! muy buena opción!!! lo mas útil que he visto y con mas seguridad y rapidez lo recomiendo gracias .

Reviews.Title: es justo lo que parece
Reviews.Author: yehudy
Reviews.Content: Luce exactamente como en la foto. es lo que esperaba. ni mas ni menos. a quien le guste aun esta marca lo puede comprar.

Reviews.Title: I hate UnlockedCellPhoneKings seller
Reviews.Author: judith
Reviews.Content: this pone is crap in my country because the phone it hasnt the 1900 MHz band.... UnlockedCellPhoneKings are scammers watchout with this seller!!!!!!!! and the pone was used!!!!!!! o my god , so shame of you....

Reviews.Title: pregunto antes de comprar
Reviews.Author: moisés ortiz
Reviews.Content: este equipo viene con banda 3G 1,2,5,6???????????? compatible para movistar venezuela???????si lo compro me viene blanco y con todos sus accesorios ?????totalmente nuevo??????gracias!!!!respondan por favor.

Reviews.Author: arnold
Reviews.Content: vhuvvuhv uvuuh uuuh uvuvu uvuu vuvu uvuuv uvuvu uvuv uuv uvuv uvuvuu uvuuv uvvu uvuu uuvvu uvuv uvuv uu u

Reviews.Title: reinord roldan
Reviews.Author: reinord roldan
Reviews.Content: excelente producto reune las condiciones exigidas, este es el segundo modelo que adquiri, me gusto el color el sofware me encanto el producto

Reviews.Title: recomendado
Reviews.Author: Edgar  Jose Pulido Aguilar
Reviews.Content: excelent..!!!! el telefono en buen estado....! se recomienda.. funciona bien..  trae todo lo que oderta en la foto bien god

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Julio Duran
Reviews.Content: I really liked this product. They note that it is very good quality and works perfectly. It is noted that in drafting cared much detail. I'd highly recommend

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: pedro morales
Reviews.Content: excelente producto ...lo recomiendo 100% funciona muy bien en Venezuela cumple con lo esperado aun doy apoyo a la plataforma de RIM

Reviews.Title: Complain
Reviews.Author: Darliana
Reviews.Content: The cellular phone has a detail on the screen like a black point on the screen! I would to know how to change it please

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: kerwin
Reviews.Content: very pleased and work like a cham, wish to get a best buy like this in the furture. loving it

Reviews.Title: I totally cheated sent a used phone that nerve
Reviews.Author: wuillian bermudez r
Reviews.Content: I sent a phone to trabajr in bands 1,4,8 by god I am of Venezuela as happens to other box was used faulty equipment and equipment with calls do not recommend it for anything. I feel cheated

Reviews.Title: quien me ayuda con un codigo MEP, que me pide el telefono
Reviews.Author: Dearshy
Reviews.Content: El telefono me pide un codigo  MEP de desbloqueo, no entiendo cuando lo venden como liberado, quien me puede ayudar, estoy en VENEZUELA

Reviews.Title: responder a mi pregunta.
Reviews.Author: octavioramirez
Reviews.Content: el blackberry 9320 levanta 3G para DIGITEL de Venezuela, y viene en color blanco como lo muestra en la imagen, gracias

Reviews.Title: This Phone is Unlocked ?
Reviews.Author: M. Romero "Andrewx10"
Reviews.Content: I wonder if this phone is unlocked to all operators ...I'll be waiting for your reply ... thanksI wonder if this phone is unlocked to all operators ...I'll be waiting for your reply ... thanksI wonder if this phone is unlocked to all operators ...I'll be waiting for your reply ... thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM 2G 850/900/1800/1900 MHz, 3G bands UMTS 800/850/1900/2100 MHz or 900/1700/2100 MHz, depending on the cellphone version. Check the description in seller condition or ask seller.
3.2 MP Camera with LED Flash; Video Recording; Wi-Fi; MP3 and MP4 Player; 3.5mm Ear Jack; microSD up to 32 GB; Bluetooth; Optical Trackpad; QWERTY Keypad; SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM and Social Networking.
BlackBerry OS 7.0; GPS with A-GPS support; HTML Browser; Internal Memory 512 MB storage, 512 MB RAM; Speed HSDPA, 7.2 Mbps; HSUPA and Document Viewer.
1450 mAh removable/rechargeable lithium-ion battery (J-S1) - Talk time: up to 7 hours; Standby time: up to 18 days
Big and bright screen display: QVGA 320x240 resolution, 164 ppi, Transmissive TFT LCD, 2.44-Inch (measured diagonally)
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 9320 White WiFi Keyboard Unlocked QuadBand Cell Phone
